attributes.action: PAY RISE FOR CARDIAC INTENSIVE CARE NURSES
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: AS CARDIAC INTENSIVE CARE NURSES, WE HAVE TO LEARN INTENSE SKILLS AND KNOWLEDGE TO ENSURE PATIENTS ARE GIVEN THE CORRECT TREATMENT AFTER CARDIAC OR THORACIC SURGERY. THIS IS NOT REFLECTED IN OUR WAGES. THERE IS NO DIFFERENCE IN WAGE SCALES OF A CLINIC OR OUT PATIENTS NURSE TO THAT OF A CARDIAC INTENSIVE NURSE.ALTHOUGH WE CHOOSE TO SPECIALISE IN CARDIAC INTENSIVE CARE, WE FEEL OUR PAY PACKETS SHOULD REFLECT THE HARD WORK AND KNOWLEDGE THAT WE PUT IN TO OUR DAILY WORK.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
